resume: Gajendra , an orphan, is adopted and grows up under Azhagarsamy's  family care. Azhagarsamy considers him like his own son. Kasthuri (Flora , Azhagarsamy's granddaughter, falls in love with Gajendra. Gajendra takes of a mentally ill girl called Indhu (Laya . The rest of the story is about why he took care of her.
